newsitem.title: GHANA: Thin trade on Ghana stock exchange.
newsitem.headline: Thin trade on Ghana stock exchange.

text.p: The Ghana Stock Exchange All-Share Index closed barely changed on Monday in thin trade, a pattern that has dominated the run-up to next month's national elections.
The GSE All-Share Index rose 0.05 points to 368.16 from Friday's 368.11 in modest volume of 13,990 shares traded.
Dealers said most investors remained on the sidelines. Offers totalled 943,610, bids 640,990.
Social Security Bank (+1 cedi to 1,047 cedis) was the lone riser. Ghana holds presidential and parliamentary elections on December 7. ($=1,720 cedis)
